sentences.cn: 一个喝醉酒、吵吵嚷嚷的夜总会歌手

sentences.en: Adds silvery brightness to gray hair and neutralizes brassy tones in all shades.
sentences.cn: 中和所有颜色秀发的黄铜色,增加灰发的光泽.

sentences.en: Musicians blast their brassy jazz from street corners.
sentences.cn: 玩音乐的人在街角大声弹奏起尖锐刺耳的爵士乐。

sentences.en: the brassy blonde behind the bar
sentences.cn: 酒吧柜台里衣着艳俗的金发女郎

sentences.en: The brassy boys put their tongues out at us.
sentences.cn: 那些厚脸皮的男孩儿朝着我们伸舌头。

sentences.en: The young ladies of tennis have been replaced by brassy girls with wicked strokes.
sentences.cn: 那些在网球场上活跃的贵妇人已经被一群打起球来异常凶猛而且不可一世的女孩子所取代.

words.tran_cn: 黄铜；黄铜制品；铜管乐器；厚脸皮
木制高尔夫球杆的一种
刺耳的；厚脸皮的；似黄铜的

trans.tran_en: a woman who is brassy is too loud, confident, or brightly dressed
